version_description:
Welcome on board with a new update which features:

- Additional languages! Now you can enjoy the game in French, Italian, German, Spanish and Russian. 
- New location to play: Moscow
- Various bug fixes and game improvements to make your gaming experience better!

Various minor improvements to make your gaming experience better. Be sure your game is up to date so you can have the best time playing!
We also recommend joining our community on Facebook, for various contests & more fun.

Welcome on board, chefs! 

- It’s time to fly to the newest city — TOKYO is now open! Check out what delicious meals are waiting for you there!
- NEW LANGUAGES have been added: now you can enjoy the game also in Japanese, Korean and Chinese.
- Also in this update: various bug fixes and game improvements to make your gaming experience better!

Join our Facebook community for contests & more fun: https://www.facebook.com/AirplaneChefsGame

Various minor improvements to make your gaming experience better.
Be sure your game is up to date so you can have the best time playing!

We also recommend joining our community on Facebook for various Contests & more fun.

Welcome on board, chefs! 

- There’s a brand-new airline in the game: RIO DE JANEIRO! Buckle up and get ready to show off your speed and awesome cooking skills. Explore all the delicious new meals awaiting you right now! 
- Also in this update: various bug fixes and improvements to make the game even better for you!

Join our Facebook community for contests, tips, and more fun: https://www.facebook.com/AirplaneChefsGame

Various minor improvements to make your gaming experience better.
Be sure your game is up to date so you can have the best time playing!

We also recommend joining our community on Facebook for various Contests & more fun.
